constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Conversion of existing garage to habitable space including replacing the front garage doors with a bay window to match the existing
decision_conditions: The proposed bay window would extend beyond a wall which forms the principal elevation of the original dwellinghouse. Accordingly, the proposed development would fail to comply with paragraph A.1(e)(i) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2 the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) and would not be lawful.

Please provide adequate information regarding your proposed schedule of works to the trees to conform with BS3998: 2010 Tree Work - Recommendations within the application boundary and any which will be affected outside of the site boundary (if any).

Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the trees or reduce their amenity value. Recommendation: Approve tree surgery work.
